content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'PO' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'GLOVIA_PROD')
CREATE TABLE GLOVIA_PROD.PO
	(
	 [PUR_CCN] nvarchar(500),
	 [PO_NUM] nvarchar(500),
	 [PO_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [MAS_LOC] nvarchar(500),
	 [ITEM] nvarchar(500),
	 [REVISION] nvarchar(500),
	 [VEN_ITEM] nvarchar(500),
	 [VEN_REVISION] nvarchar(500),
	 [STK] nvarchar(500),
	 [QTY_ORD] numeric(38,18),
	 [QTY_REC] numeric(38,18),
	 [REQD_DATE] datetime2(7),
	 [UM] nvarchar(500),
	 [UNIT_PRICE] numeric(38,18),
	 [WO_NUM] nvarchar(500),
	 [WO_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [OPERATION] nvarchar(500),
	 [SO] nvarchar(500),
	 [QA_STAT] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAXABLE] nvarchar(500),
	 [CERT_REQD] nvarchar(500),
	 [CARRIER] nvarchar(500),
	 [GL_ACCT] nvarchar(500),
	 [AGC] nvarchar(500),
	 [REQUESTOR] nvarchar(500),
	 [PR_NUM] nvarchar(500),
	 [PR_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [MRP_NETTABLE] nvarchar(500),
	 [COMP_DATE] datetime2(7),
	 [CLOSED_DATE] datetime2(7),
	 [SHIP_TO_NAME] nvarchar(500),
	 [SHIP_TO_NAME2] nvarchar(500),
	 [SHIP_TO_ADDR1] nvarchar(500),
	 [SHIP_TO_ADDR2] nvarchar(500),
	 [SHIP_TO_ADDR3] nvarchar(500),
	 [SHIP_TO_ADDR4] nvarchar(500),
	 [SHIP_TO_ADDR5] nvarchar(500),
	 [SHIP_TO_ADDR6] nvarchar(500),
	 [SHIP_TO_CITY] nvarchar(500),
	 [SHIP_TO_STATE] nvarchar(500),
	 [SHIP_TO_POST_CD] nvarchar(500),
	 [SHIP_TO_COUNTRY] nvarchar(500),
	 [SHIP_TO_ADDRESS_OVERRIDE] nvarchar(500),
	 [SALES_CCN] nvarchar(500),
	 [SO_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [EXPED] nvarchar(500),
	 [UNIT_PRICE_ADV_STAT] nvarchar(500),
	 [BO_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [LAST_DEL] numeric(38,18),
	 [UM_SCALAR] nvarchar(500),
	 [REC_TOLER] nvarchar(500),
	 [DEL_COUNT] numeric(38,18),
	 [LINE_CMNT_CTR] numeric(38,18),
	 [ORIGIN_CNTRY] nvarchar(500),
	 [DISPATCH_CNTRY] nvarchar(500),
	 [BOOK_RATE] numeric(38,18),
	 [BOOK_RATE_DIV] nvarchar(500),
	 [FROZEN_DATE] datetime2(7),
	 [VCH_TOLER] nvarchar(500),
	 [NSD_ITEM_DESC] nvarchar(500),
	 [PRICE_CHANGE_DATE] datetime2(7),
	 [REV] numeric(38,18),
	 [REC_AMT] numeric(38,18),
	 [REC_HOME_AMT] numeric(38,18),
	 [VOUCH_QTY] numeric(38,18),
	 [BO_NUM] nvarchar(500),
	 [CCN] nvarchar(500),
	 [VQ] nvarchar(500),
	 [VQ_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [OUTSIDE_PROCESSING] nvarchar(500),
	 [RP_SCHED] nvarchar(500),
	 [RP_OPERATION] nvarchar(500),
	 [SEIBAN] nvarchar(500),
	 [DEMAND_SOURCE] nvarchar(500),
	 [PRP] nvarchar(500),
	 [TAR_COST1] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST2] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST3] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST4] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST5] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST6] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST7] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST8] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST9] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST10] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST11] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST12] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST13] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST14] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST15] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST16] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST17] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST18] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST19] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST20] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST21] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST22] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST23] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_COST24] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAR_LAST_UPDATE_DATE] datetime2(7),
	 [TAR_HIS_ODOM] numeric(38,18),
	 [NSD_VAT] nvarchar(500),
	 [EDI_REVISION] nvarchar(500),
	 [STATUS] nvarchar(500),
	 [SO_LINE_EXISTS] nvarchar(500),
	 [INV_FLAG] nvarchar(500),
	 [INV_QTY] numeric(38,18),
	 [LAST_RTV] numeric(38,18),
	 [FPO_NUM] nvarchar(500),
	 [FPO_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [USER_ALPHA1] nvarchar(500),
	 [USER_ALPHA2] nvarchar(500),
	 [USER_ALPHA3] nvarchar(500),
	 [USER_NUM1] numeric(38,18),
	 [USER_NUM2] numeric(38,18),
	 [USER_NUM3] numeric(38,18),
	 [USER_DATE] datetime2(7),
	 [USER_TIME] nvarchar(500),
	 [DEPT] nvarchar(500),
	 [MAT_SUPPLY] nvarchar(500),
	 [PRICE_SOURCE] nvarchar(500),
	 [PRICE_TYPE] nvarchar(500),
	 [PRODUCTION_BUCKET] nvarchar(500),
	 [WC] nvarchar(500),
	 [ZERO_PRICE_REASON] nvarchar(500),
	 [CANC_DATE] datetime2(7),
	 [CANC_QTY] numeric(38,18),
	 [CANC_RSN] nvarchar(500),
	 [ORIG_UNIT_PRICE] numeric(38,18),
	 [CMNT_WEB_VIEW] nvarchar(500),
	 [COMP_SUB_METHOD] nvarchar(500),
	 [COMP_TIME] nvarchar(500),
	 [CONSIGN_BIN] nvarchar(500),
	 [CONSIGN_LOCATION] nvarchar(500),
	 [CONSIGN_QTY] numeric(38,18),
	 [ORIG_ITEM] nvarchar(500),
	 [ORIG_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [ORIG_REVISION] nvarchar(500),
	 [REQD_TIME] nvarchar(500),
	 [STD_TEXT_WEB_VIEW] nvarchar(500)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--AS

COPY INTO GLOVIA_PROD.PO
(PUR_CCN 1, PO_NUM 2, PO_LINE 3, MAS_LOC 4, ITEM 5, REVISION 6, VEN_ITEM 7, VEN_REVISION 8, STK 9, QTY_ORD 10, QTY_REC 11, REQD_DATE 12, UM 13, UNIT_PRICE 14, WO_NUM 15, WO_LINE 16, OPERATION 17, SO 18, QA_STAT 19, TAXABLE 20, CERT_REQD 21, CARRIER 22, GL_ACCT 23, AGC 24, REQUESTOR 25, PR_NUM 26, PR_LINE 27, MRP_NETTABLE 28, COMP_DATE 29, CLOSED_DATE 30, SHIP_TO_NAME 31, SHIP_TO_NAME2 32, SHIP_TO_ADDR1 33, SHIP_TO_ADDR2 34, SHIP_TO_ADDR3 35, SHIP_TO_ADDR4 36, SHIP_TO_ADDR5 37, SHIP_TO_ADDR6 38, SHIP_TO_CITY 39, SHIP_TO_STATE 40, SHIP_TO_POST_CD 41, SHIP_TO_COUNTRY 42, SHIP_TO_ADDRESS_OVERRIDE 43, SALES_CCN 44, SO_LINE 45, EXPED 46, UNIT_PRICE_ADV_STAT 47, BO_LINE 48, LAST_DEL 49, UM_SCALAR 50, REC_TOLER 51, DEL_COUNT 52, LINE_CMNT_CTR 53, ORIGIN_CNTRY 54, DISPATCH_CNTRY 55, BOOK_RATE 56, BOOK_RATE_DIV 57, FROZEN_DATE 58, VCH_TOLER 59, NSD_ITEM_DESC 60, PRICE_CHANGE_DATE 61, REV 62, REC_AMT 63, REC_HOME_AMT 64, VOUCH_QTY 65, BO_NUM 66, CCN 67, VQ 68, VQ_LINE 69, OUTSIDE_PROCESSING 70, RP_SCHED 71, RP_OPERATION 72, SEIBAN 73, DEMAND_SOURCE 74, PRP 75, TAR_COST1 76, TAR_COST2 77, TAR_COST3 78, TAR_COST4 79, TAR_COST5 80, TAR_COST6 81, TAR_COST7 82, TAR_COST8 83, TAR_COST9 84, TAR_COST10 85, TAR_COST11 86, TAR_COST12 87, TAR_COST13 88, TAR_COST14 89, TAR_COST15 90, TAR_COST16 91, TAR_COST17 92, TAR_COST18 93, TAR_COST19 94, TAR_COST20 95, TAR_COST21 96, TAR_COST22 97, TAR_COST23 98, TAR_COST24 99, TAR_LAST_UPDATE_DATE 100, TAR_HIS_ODOM 101, NSD_VAT 102, EDI_REVISION 103, STATUS 104, SO_LINE_EXISTS 105, INV_FLAG 106, INV_QTY 107, LAST_RTV 108, FPO_NUM 109, FPO_LINE 110, USER_ALPHA1 111, USER_ALPHA2 112, USER_ALPHA3 113, USER_NUM1 114, USER_NUM2 115, USER_NUM3 116, USER_DATE 117, USER_TIME 118, DEPT 119, MAT_SUPPLY 120, PRICE_SOURCE 121, PRICE_TYPE 122, PRODUCTION_BUCKET 123, WC 124, ZERO_PRICE_REASON 125, CANC_DATE 126, CANC_QTY 127, CANC_RSN 128, ORIG_UNIT_PRICE 129, CMNT_WEB_VIEW 130, COMP_SUB_METHOD 131, COMP_TIME 132, CONSIGN_BIN 133, CONSIGN_LOCATION 134, CONSIGN_QTY 135, ORIG_ITEM 136, ORIG_LINE 137, ORIG_REVISION 138, REQD_TIME 139, STD_TEXT_WEB_VIEW 140)
FROM 'https://modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/GLOVIA_PROD/PO/WO-INITIAL.parquet'
WITH

)
--END
